name: Red (itch) (RedTheGame)
description:
Inspired by the famous Brothers Grimm short story Little Red Riding Hood, Phantom Grimm Entertainment presents RED, a 3rd person puzzle thriller game where you play as Little Red Riding Hood searching through the forest for notes containing instructions on how to kill the big bad wolf.  

*For best performance, please play the game in any 16:9 resolution*

Ramah Al Aidie

Programmer, Developer
